oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Garrett's Snuff Variety Show #350 - 1942-05-05
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Garrett's Snuff sponsored Variety show, program numbers 350 and 351, featuring Happy Hal Burns (performer) and the Variety Gang (performers), Kid Clark (performer), the Love Brothers (performers), Lonnie Love (performer) and comedy skits performed by the cast. Broadcast on May 5, 1942 and May 6, 1942, respectively.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Happy Hal Burns; Kid Clark; Lonnie Love; Love Brothers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Opening theme -- Opening statement -- Happy Hal Burns introduces the first tune -- Polly Wolly Doodle (Happy Hal Burns and the Variety Gang) -- Garrett's Snuff commercial -- Burns introduces the next tune -- You're A Flower Blooming In The Wildwood (Love Brothers) -- Comedy skit (cast) -- Garrett's Snuff commercial -- [Unidentified tune] (Kid Clark accordion) -- Closing memory thought -- Jesus Loves Me (Variety Gang) -- Closing statement -- Closing theme -- [break] -- Opening theme -- Opening statement -- Pretty Little Pink (Happy Hal Burns and the Variety Gang) -- Garrett's Snuff commercial -- Burns introduces the next tune -- My Time Will Come Someday (Lonnie Love) -- Comedy skit (cast) -- Tilly and Uncle Ned's Joke Book and Garrett's Snuff commercial -- The Monkey's Wedding (Variety Gang) -- Closing memory thought -- I Need Thee Every Hour (Happy Hal Burns and the Variety Gang) -- Closing statement -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Garrett's Snuff and Dental Snuff Variety Program (Radio program); Burns, Hal;
